info.+content: Dr Slump et la petite Arale
Dr. Slump: Las Travesuras de Arale
Dr.スランプ アラレちゃん

Dr Slump creates a little android girl, Arale, very stong, happy and totally common senseless. They live in Penguin Village where the strangest things happen (i.e. the dawn is announced by a little pig wearing a basquee).
#1: "Waiwai World" by Ado Mizumori and Koorogi '73
#1: "Ara Ara Arale-chan" by Ado Mizumori and Koorogi '73
"Pa Pa Perma no Uta" (パパパーマのうた) by Kazuko Sugiyama (eps 8,13,20)
Dr. スランプ アラレちゃん @ Toei Animation
